events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order.
Hello! Iâ€™m Sarah and I will assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and details of the item you received?
Could you please send a photo of the item you received versus what was originally ordered, to help us verify the issue quickly?
Thanks for the quick reply. My order number is 7845123 and I have attached photos showing that the item is not what I ordered.
We have reviewed your photos and will process a full refund immediately. You should see the money back on your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for handling this so promptly. I appreciate the quick resolution and look forward to the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the issue is now resolved. Please contact us if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
As we have not received further inquiries, your refund case is now closed. Thank you for contacting our support team!
